Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Muslim women were singing Hindu religious songs at a mosque in Dubai, when in reality the video was taken at an ashram in India.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading Facebook post and does not provide any additional evidence.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video was taken at a mosque in Dubai without verifying the authenticity of the source.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video was actually taken at an ashram in India, not at a mosque in Dubai.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the misleading Facebook post was intentionally created to spread false information or provoke a reaction.
